location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Copy of letter No 1668/463 of 1872 from Colonel Lewis Pelly, HBM's Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Bombay to The Secretary to Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter enclosing letter 639/199 of 1872 (no longer enclosed) from the Political Agent at Muscat, Edward Charles Ross, reporting that Seyed Ibrahim bin Gais [Ibrahim bin Qais] had taken possession of Khabooreh [Al Khaburah] and its fort.
